mapper.insert: insert into daily select cycle.cid, cycle.pid, cal.dt, cycle.cnt from cycle, (select to_char(to_date(#{ym} || '01', 'yyyyMMdd') + (level-1),'d') day, to_char(to_date(#{ym} || '01', 'yyyyMMdd') + (level-1),'yyyyMMdd') dt from dual connect by level <= last_day(to_date(#{ym},'yyyyMM')) - to_date(#{ym} || '01', 'yyyyMMdd')+1) cal where cycle.day = cal.day
